statements: SELECT * FROM drone_telemetry_data;
SELECT telemetry_id, altitude, speed FROM drone_telemetry_data;
SELECT drone_id, timestamp FROM drone_telemetry_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM drone_telemetry_data WHERE altitude > 100 ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT drone_id, battery_level FROM drone_telemetry_data WHERE speed < 50;
SELECT telemetry_id, drone_id, altitude FROM drone_telemetry_data WHERE speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT telemetry_id, latitude, longitude FROM drone_telemetry_data WHERE altitude < 1000 ORDER BY altitude ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT drone_id, timestamp, speed FROM drone_telemetry_data WHERE battery_level < 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM drone_telemetry_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30.0 AND 40.0 AND longitude BETWEEN -90.0 AND -80.0;
SELECT timestamp, altitude, battery_level FROM drone_telemetry_data WHERE speed > 30 AND battery_level >= 50 ORDER BY telemetry_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM drones WHERE drone_id = 100;
SELECT telemetry_data FROM drones WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT drone_id, timestamp FROM drones ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM flight_logs WHERE flight_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT drone_id, flight_duration FROM flight_logs WHERE flight_path IS NOT NULL ORDER BY flight_duration DESC;
SELECT * FROM drones WHERE drone_id = 12345 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, drone_id, telemetry_data->'battery_level' AS battery_level FROM drones WHERE drone_id = 54321 AND timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT d.id, d.drone_id, f.flight_date, f.flight_duration FROM drones d JOIN flight_logs f ON d.drone_id = f.drone_id WHERE f.flight_duration > INTERVAL '1 hour' ORDER BY f.flight_date ASC;
SELECT id, drone_id, telemetry_data->'location' AS location, timestamp FROM drones WHERE telemetry_data->>'status' = 'active' AND timestamp > NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
SELECT log_id, drone_id, flight_date, ST_AsText(flight_path) AS flight_path FROM flight_logs WHERE drone_id IN (98765, 45678) ORDER BY flight_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT manufacturer, model, max_speed FROM drones WHERE drone_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT drone_id, speed, battery_level FROM telemetry_data WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT log_id, start_time, mission_status FROM flight_logs WHERE mission_status = 'completed';
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT manufacturer, model, max_speed FROM drones WHERE manufacturer = 'DJI';
SELECT drone_id, manufacturer, model, battery_life FROM drones WHERE max_speed > 20;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT drone_id, altitude, speed, battery_level FROM telemetry_data WHERE battery_level < 50 ORDER BY altitude DESC;
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT drone_name, max_speed, status FROM drones WHERE max_altitude > 500;
SELECT id, drone_name, max_speed, max_altitude, status FROM drones WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE drone_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT maintenance_id, drone_id, maintenance_date, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_logs WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM drones WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT drone_name, max_speed FROM drones ORDER BY max_speed DESC;
SELECT telemetry_id, latitude, longitude, altitude FROM telemetry_data WHERE altitude > 1000;
SELECT flight_duration, distance_covered, average_speed FROM flight_logs WHERE drone_id = 3 ORDER BY start_timestamp DESC;
SELECT maintenance_date, maintenance_type, technician_name FROM maintenance_logs WHERE drone_id = 2 AND maintenance_type = 'routine';
SELECT * FROM drones;
SELECT id, name, manufacturer FROM drones ORDER BY manufacturer DESC;
SELECT serial_number, max_speed FROM drones WHERE max_altitude > 500;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE drone_id = 3 AND speed > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT error_code, error_message FROM drone_errors WHERE drone_id = 5;
SELECT id, name, manufacturer, max_speed FROM drones WHERE max_altitude > 5000 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM telemetry_data WHERE drone_id = 3 AND altitude < 1000;
SELECT error_id, error_code, error_message FROM drone_errors WHERE error_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY error_timestamp DESC;
SELECT d.id, d.name, r.maintenance_type, r.maintenance_date FROM drones d JOIN maintenance_records r ON d.id = r.drone_id WHERE r.maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';

SELECT l.log_id, l.log_timestamp, d.name, l.operation_type, l.operation_description FROM operation_logs l JOIN drones d ON l.drone_id = d.id WHERE l.operation_type IN ('Takeoff', 'Landing') ORDER BY l.log_timestamp DESC;
